summary:
Add a very challenging battle against Vampires
Vanilla Assets only No Script
descriptionHtml:
Add a very challenging battle against Vampires
Vanilla Assets only No Script
[color=#00ff00]
For Additional Enemies[/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80891]Vampire Covenant Treasure Battle[/url]

Story:
After the Dragonborn defeat Lord Harkon, the remaining vampires gather on [b]Bloodlet Throne[/b] and awaken the Ancient Vampire Elders.
The strongest leaders of vampires march to reclaim the [b]Castle Volkihar[/b] first before they destroy the Dragonborn and Dawnguards.

[b][size=3][b][size=3]If you defeat them they will respawn within 10 to 30 [/size][/b][b][size=3]days [/size][/b]
just dont visit the place within [b][size=3][b][size=3]10 to 30 [/size][/b][b][size=3]days[/size][/b][/size][/b].[/size][/b]

I create this mod because I really like hard enemies, challenges and getting my dragonborn's *ss get kicked.
My plan is I would only use this for my personal use but maybe other's would like it so I upload it.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Location: [b]Castle Volkihar[/b] and [b]Bloodlet Throne[/b]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirements: Skyrim Latest Update, Dawnguard, Dragonborn
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation: Use NMM or manually install by drag and drop to Data Folder
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update to latest version: Download and Overwrite if ask
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstall: Use NMM or manually delete files and esp (Completely safe to uninstall anytime)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compatibility: Compatible with all Mods because I only use Vanilla Assets
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Future Plans: Add More
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out my other Skyrim mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/27633780/?tb=mods&pUp=1]dlarkz skyrim mods[/url]
author: dlarkz
